member.name: T:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker
member.summary: Tracks changes of objects known to the ORM

member.name: M:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.GetEntry(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the entry that belongs to given object

member.name: M:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.GetEntry(System.Int32,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the entry that belongs to an object of a certain type with a certain id

member.name: M:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.AddEntry(ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry)
member.summary: Adds an entry to the change tracker

member.name: P:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.Count
member.summary: The number of entries in the change tracker

member.name: P:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.InsertedObjects
member.summary: Returns all objects marked as inserted

member.name: P:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.UnmodifiedObjects
member.summary: Returns all objects marked as unmodified

member.name: P:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.ModifiedObjects
member.summary: Returns all objects marked as modified

member.name: P:ChangerTracking.Interfaces.IChangeTracker.DeletedObjects
member.summary: Returns all objects marked as deleted
